task.title: Requirements
task.shortdesc: Requirements are tasks that a particapant must complete to meet or maintain a program. Only active requirements are assigned to participant when the program term is generated. A Program cannot be activated unless it has at least one Requirement related to it .

context.p: To create a new Requirement from the Program detail page:

step.cmd: Navigte to the Requirements related list. Click the New Requirement button. (The Program looks up to the Program record and autopopulates.)
Select the Requirement Type from picklist. This list can be modified to meet specific business needs during implementation.
Enter Start Date and End Date if a requirement has a designated start and or end date. Only requirements with a start date in the past and an end date in the future will be assigned as a Goal.
Enter a numeric value in the Display Order field to identify the order the Goals are to be listed.

step.info: Maintenance (checkbox). Identifies a requirement with the maintenance term. When unchecked, this requirement is considered for the candidate term
Published (chekbox). Displays requirement on the Program Profile Page. If unchecked, the requirement is visibile in the staff view only.
Required (checkbox). Identifies requirement that must be completed in order for the program term to be completed.
Navigation URL. Logic behind the Register button on the Program Profile page. When the button is clicked, redirects the prorgam participant to designated location.
Dependency. List the rewuirements - Requiement Name (auto-number) - that must be completed in order for the Register button for this requirement to be active.
